verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
For every pain, you've endured
Every tear you've cried
In the world of your God
The victory is won
I know the journey has been long
I know the road, it has been tough
Wipe the tears from your eyes
For the victory is won

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Victory is won
Heavens are open
(Seasons) Seasons have changed
Victory is won

verse.name: v1c
verse.lines:
Victory is won
Sound it from the rooftops
(Seasons) Seasons have changed
Victory is won

verse.name: v1d
verse.lines:
The siege is frustrated
The wait is over
The battles are fought
And the victory is won
Your heavens are open
Your harvest is great
And Your miracles abound
And the victory is won

verse.name: v1e
verse.lines:
Victory is won
Victory is won
Heavens are open
Seasons have changed
Victory is won

verse.name: v1f
verse.lines:
Victory is won
Sound it from the rooftops
Seasons have changed
Victory is won

verse.name: v1g
verse.lines:
Victory is won
Victory is won
Victory is won
Victory is won
Victory is won
Victory is won
Victory is won

verse.name: v1h
verse.lines:
There's a truth that we know
Over 2, 000 years ago
Jesus made an open show
Of hell and it's hosts
The devil is a liar
The blow he got was final
We lift up a shout
For the victory is won

verse.name: v1i
verse.lines:
Victory is won
Victory is won
Victory is won
Victory is won
Victory is won
Victory is won
Victory is won
